1.title: Economics and the Survival of Material Civilization
1.plot: In this course we will explore Capitalism and consider how we can become rich by applying its principles. With Capitalism we can become rich as individuals, as groups, as countries and finally as a human society. A rich and prosperous human society is a prerequisite for world peace.
